name: LGBTQ Community Listening Session for Superintendent Search
description:
Join the discussion as the search for the next Minneapolis Parks Superintendent is underway! Eight additional listening sessions throughout August are designed to hear from specific community groups. Children’s activities, light food and refreshments will be provided. The nationwide search kicked off in July with a series of public listening sessions. Applications for Superintendent are accepted through August 31. Get details at

Loring Community Arts Center
1382 Willow St. Minneapolis MN 55403 US 612-370-4929
